sub_title: Chair Of The Board Of Directors at EXPAND, The European Immuno-neuropsychiatric Association
summary: I am committed to a vision in which children, adolescents and adults with immune-mediated behavior and neuropsychiatric conditions obtain a timely diagnosis from informed, compassionate providers and receive individualized, transdisciplinary treatment and support regardless of where they live. In my advocacy, I seek creative and collaborative ways to achieve this vision. The skills and experiences I bring to my leadership roles were developed as a legislative assistant, as the executive director of a non-profit organization benefitting at-risk youth, and as an urban planner. What I enjoyed most in those roles, and what serves me well in my advocacy, is bringing together a broad range of stakeholders and experts to work creatively and collaboratively to solve complex issues. I enjoy the opportunity to meet interesting and talented people, to learn from them, and to create opportunities for positive change. The experience of living in the United States, Germany, Finland, and the Netherlands has been an asset in my work within an international organization. I feel fortunate to have experienced different cultures and the opportunities  to connect and form friendships and professional relationships with people of many nationalities.

profile_positions.description:
EXPAND is a pan-European patient advocacy organization for children, adolescents and adults with immune-mediated, neuro-psychiatric diseases and/or disorders. These diseases and disorders combine neurological and/or immunological problems with psychiatric and/or behavioral symptoms.

Members of the EXPAND association are national (in)formal patient groups, patient associations and/or foundations. These organizations advocate for the interests of this patient group and their families. In naming their organizations and describing those they serve, these organizations use a variety of terms and acronyms to encapsulate these diseases and disorders including neuroimmune, immunopsychiatric, PANS (Pediatric Acute-onset Neuropsychiatric Syndrome), PANDAS (Pediatric Autoimmune Neuropsychiatric Disorders Associated with Strep), and BGE (Basal Ganglia Encephalitis).
profile_positions.title: Chair Of The Board Of Directors

profile_positions.description: PANS/PANDAS Nederland Patiëntenvereniging provides education, resources and support to children and adults affected by Pediatric Acute-onset Neuropsychiatric Syndrome (PANS) and Pediatric Autoimmune Neuropsychiatric Disorders Associated with Strep (PANDAS) and related encephalopathies.
profile_positions.title: Patient Advocate

company.name: as advanced by the Children's Success Foundation

profile_positions.company: as advanced by the Children's Success Foundation
profile_positions.description: The Nurtured Heart Approach®, developed by Howard Glasser, is a relationship-driven methodology created to help children and adults: 1) build on their inherent Inner Wealth™; 2) enhance their emotional portfolios; and 3) achieve new levels of confidence and competency.  It simultaneously supports and energizes those who practice the approach by providing a sound framework, on which they can rely, to cultivate the best possible version of those with whom they come into contact.  It provides a skill set and increased confidence that allows those practicing it to address even severe, aggressive and violent behavior. -- Behavior that can be caused by a variety of factors including brain inflammation that causes neuroimmune disorders such as PANS/PANDAS. According to Kiki Chang, a child, adolescent, and adult psychiatrist specializing in mood and neuropsychiatric disorders, “We can’t say how many kids with psychiatric symptoms have an underlying immune or inflammatory component to their disorder, but given the burgeoning research indicating that inflammation drives mood disorders and other psychiatric problems, it’s likely to be a large subset of children and even adults diagnosed with psychiatric illnesses.” (Source: Brain Attack, Stanford Medicine, Fall 2014).  The Nurtured Heart Approach® has much to offer anyone and everyone, but, I believe, particularly parents navigating their child's complicated healing journey from PANS/PANDAS.
profile_positions.title: Nurtured Heart Approach Advocate

profile_positions.description: Expand is a newly-formed European-wide association of patient advocacy organizations committed to working creatively, collaboratively and effectively on an international level to improve the lives of children and adults affected by immune-mediated behavior and psychiatric disorders such as PANS/PANDAS. These patients and their families deserve informed and compassionate care.
